objectives_summary: Implement consistent configuration across all the servers whether Windows or Linux

items.title: Managing Your Data with Microsoft Access

objectives_summary: Design of data entry applications with Microsoft Access including table design, entry forms and printed reports.

Design of user-friendly data entry forms for quick and accurate entry of data.
